price: Pagkatapos tunay na ukol sa kanila higit doon ay talagang isang halo ng nakapapasong tubig.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
